Commands.Name: top
Commands.HelpText: Displays top stats - by Kurt Kellner of ECS Team

Options.cygwin: -c, force run under cygwin (Use this to run: 'cmd /c start cf top -cygwin' )
Options.no-top-check: -ntc, do not check if there are other instances of top running on this OS
Options.nozzles: -n, specify the number of nozzle instances (default: 2)
